ledgerUserTip: If you want to import private key/keystore or connect Ledger, need to [Create Wallet] or [Restore Wallet] first
termsAndPrivacy_0: To use the service provide by Auro Wallet, you need to carefully read and fully understand the Terms of Conditions and Privacy Policy.
termsAndPrivacy_1: You can read <conditions>Terms and Conditions</conditions> and <policy>Privacy Policy</policy> to learn the details. If you agree, please click  [Agree] to start using the wallet service.
reset_tip_1: Are you sure you want to reset your wallet?
reset_tip_2: After reset, all the data of the existing wallet will be lost, You can only use the mnemonic phrase to restore. Please make sure that you have backed up the mnemonic phrase before reset the wallet.
confirm_reset_tip: Please enter "delete" to confirm reset the wallet
createPasswordTip: Security password will be used to send transactions and identity verification in Auro Wallet. Auro Wallet won't store the security password or retrieve it for you. Pleased keep it safe.
passwordDifferent: Passwords do not match, please retype!
backup_checkbox_1: If mnemonic phrase lost, my funds will be lost forever.
backup_checkbox_2: I take full responsibility for protecting the mnemonic.
backup_mne_title: Please write down the following mnemonic phrase and keep it in a safe palce.
confirmMneTip: To ensure you have backed up the mnemonic phrase. Please select 12 words in correct order.
backup_success: Congrats! You have created a wallet successfully!
backup_success_restore: Congrats! You have restored a wallet successfully!
ledgerSuccessTip: Congrats! You've successfully imported the ledger wallet.
inputSeed: Please enter mnemonic phrase in order, with each word separated by a space.
feeTooHigh: Fees are much higher than average
sendAddressError: Please enter a valid wallet address
amountError: Please enter a valid transaction amount
inputFeeError: Please enter a valid transaction fee
name: Name
addressQrTip: Scan the QR code and transfer MINA to it
ledgerNotSupport: This browser does not support Ledger temporarily
copyTipContent: Copying the private key is risky, and the clipboard is easily monitored and stolen by third-party applications.
confirmEnv: Please ensure that the system and network environment you are using is absolutely safe before performing this operation
privateKeyTip_1: The private key consists of a string of characters, and owning the private key is equivalent to owning the asset ownership.
privateKeyTip_2: Once the private key is lost, it cannot be retrieved. Please make sure to Backup the private key and keep it in a safe place.
deleteAccountTip: The deleted account can only be restored by Mnemonic Phrase or Private Key. Please make sure you have backed up your Mnemonic Phrase or Private Key.
backTips_2: The Mnemonic phrase consists of 12 English words, which cannot be retrieved if they are lost. Make sure the mnemonic phrase is kept in a secure location.
backTips_3: When the wallet can't be accessed because the device is lost or any other reasons, importing mnemonic phrase is the only way to retrieve your assets.
importSameAccount_1: The address of the account to be created is:
importSameAccount_2: An existing imported account [{{accountName}}] is a duplicate of this address. Auro Wallet does not support the creation of duplicate account addresses. Please go to the Account Management to delete the imported account.
pleaseInputPriKey: Please enter mnemonic words in order, with each word separated by a space.
importAccount_2: The imported accounts will not be associated with your originally created Auro wallet.
importAccount_3: The imported accounts will be marked with [Imported] in the account list.
pleaseInputKeyPair: Please enter the contents of the Keystore file.
ledgerImportTip: Please click the [Import] button and confirm on your Ledger wallet
back2extension: Please continue the operation in the wallet app.
pleaseConnectLedger: Connect your Ledger to the computer
pleaseOpenInLedger: Open the Mina app on your Ledger device
walletAbout: Auro Wallet is a Mina wallet developed by the community. It is simple, convenient, and fully open source, which currently supports all the functions of the Mina mainnet.
addNetworkTip: Only add custom networks you trust. Using unknown nodes can be risky.
revealMneTip: Please write down the following mnemonic phrase and keep it in a safe place.
mneReminder: Do not share your mnemonic phrase!
mneReminderContent: If someone has your mnemonic phrase, they will have full control of your wallet, Do not share it.
approveTip: This website would like to view account
approveWaring: Make sure you only connect to trusted sites
watchModeDeleteTip: Auro wallet no longer support the [Watch Account] , you need to <red>delete all watch accounts</red> before you can continue to use.
walletConnected: Auro Wallet has connected this website.
noAccountConnect: Auro Wallet has not connected this website. To connect this website, please find the connect button in the website.
unknownInfo: Unknown node, unable to provide history.
notActiveAccountTip: Based  on the  features of Mina network, activating an account needs to consume 1 MINA for purchasing block storage space, and this fee will be deducted at the first transfer, not charged by the wallet.
emptyDelegateDesc: Delegating MINA to the block producer node can help you obtain rewards for producing blocks.The Block Producer will distribute the rewards according to your delegated proportion,and the percentage of rewards depends on the rate setting by the Block Producer.About the effective time of delegating and rewards distributing rules: <click>Staking Guide</click>
searchPlaceholder: Search block producer name or address
notificationContent: The transfer has been confirmed, click to view the transaction.
ledgerConnectSuccess: Your Ledger wallet has been successfully connected.
waitingLedgerConfirmTip: Please confirm in the Ledger hardware wallet, the signature may take 1-3 minutes.
waitingLedgerConfirmTip_2: Do not close this window until then.
